org.corfudb.util.serializer

Interface ISerializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorfuSerializer, JavaSerializer, JsonSerializer, PrimitiveSerializer

    public interface ISerializer
    This class represents a serializer, which takes an object and reads/writes it to a bytebuf. Created by mwei on 9/17/15.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Map<Class<?>,Function<?,byte[]>> customHashingMap 
      static Map<Class<?>,Function<?,byte[]>> hashConversionMap
      This map provides some methods for performing hashing on known types.
      static ThreadLocal<Kryo> kryos

      • registerCustomHasher

                                      Function<T,byte[]> hashFunction)
        Register a new custom hasher with the serializer.
        Parameters:
        cls - The class this hasher will handle.
        hashFunction - The function to execute to generate the hash.

      • getCustomHasher

        default <T> Function<T,byte[]> getCustomHasher(Class<T> cls)
        Get a custom hasher from the serializer.
        Parameters:
        cls - The class to obtain a hasher for.
        Returns:
        A function to generate a hash, or null, if no custom hasher was registered.

      • hash

        default byte[] hash(Object o)
        Given an object, generate a hash for it. This hash is used internally by Corfu for conflict resolution. The default implementation uses xxHash, a fast non-cryptographic hash algorithm on the serialized payload. It tries to be smart about some primitive types, not serializing them if possible to generate the hashcode.
        Parameters:
        o - The object to hash.
        Returns:
        The hashed object value, as a byte array.

      • clone

        default Object clone(Object o,
                     CorfuRuntime rt)
        Clone an object through serialization.
        Parameters:
        o - The object to clone.
        Returns:
        The cloned object.
